column4: Citation in which data originally reported.
Site at which crop was harvested.
Species for which yield was measured.
Date on which crop was harvested.

column5: Level of confidence in harvest date. See documentation.

column4: Number of replicates used to estimate mean and statistical summary.
ID of user who entered data.

column7: and means that data have not been checked. 1 indicates that the data have been checked and are correct\
column8: -1 indicates that data have been checked and found to be incorrect or suspicious\

column4: Level of access required to view data.
